description:
Dainichi Nyorai guides a family, a fisherman learns to appreciate what he has, and a young monk learns not to judge a book by its cover.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Danburi Chouja / Uo Nyoubou / Ikkyuu-san no Tonchibanashi
The Dragonfly Rich Man / The Fish Wife / Ikkyuu-san`s Funny Story
だんぶり長者 / 魚女房 / 一休さんのとんち話
